Question.Subject: How to import my bookmarks and history from Chrome to Firefox?
Question.Content: How do I import my bookmarks and history from Chrome to Firefox??? I am switching from Chrome to Firefox...thanks...
Question.ChosenAnswer:
1. Click the Tools tools menu menu in Google Chrome. 2. Select Bookmark manager. 3. Click the Tools menu in the manager. 4. Select Export bookmarks. 5. Choose a location where you want your exported file to be saved, then click Save.
Now -----> ( In Firefox )
Bookmarks > Organize Bookmarks > Import and Backup > Import HTML

Answer.Content:
1. Click the Tools tools menu menu in Google Chrome. 2. Select Bookmark manager. 3. Click the Tools menu in the manager. 4. Select Export bookmarks. 5. Choose a location where you want your exported file to be saved, then click Save.
Now -----> ( In Firefox )
Bookmarks > Organize Bookmarks > Import and Backup > Import HTML
